tool_description: Creates smooth connecting phrases and sentences to link speech sections, maintain flow, and guide audience through the presentation.

speech_sections.description: Sequential list of speech sections to connect

transition_style.description: Style of transitions: formal, conversational, dynamic, subtle

speech_pace.description: Overall speech tempo: slow, moderate, fast

error_messages: Insufficient sections: Provide at least 2 sections to create transitions
Invalid transition style: Must be one of [formal, conversational, dynamic, subtle]
Invalid speech pace: Must be one of [slow, moderate, fast]
Section descriptions too vague: Provide clear section descriptions for relevant transitions
usage: Enter speech sections array in sequential order and select transition style. Optionally specify speech pace for appropriate transition rhythm.

transition_phrases.description: Connecting phrases for each section transition

signpost_language.description: Clear indicators of speech structure and direction

flow_assessment.description: Overall evaluation of speech flow and coherence
